task.title: Request a Floating License from a License Server Running as a Java Servlet

step.cmd: Contact your server administrator to get network address and login details for the license server.

Go to Help Register
and click the Register button.
step.stepresult: The license registration dialog is displayed.

step.cmd: Choose Use a license server as licensing method.
Select HTTP/HTTPS Server as server type.
In the URL field enter the address of the license server.
step.stepxmp: The URL address has the following format: http://hostName:port/oXygenLicenseServlet/license-servlet

step.cmd: Complete the User and Password fields.

taskbody.result: If a floating license is available, it is registered in . To display the license details, open the About dialog from the Help menu. If a floating license is not available, you will get a message listing the users currently using floating licenses.
